name: Answer North America
tagline: Get the answering service you need
description:
Imagine a complete solution that allows you to accept and track all your calls, emails, faxes and generates a presence on the Web. You will never lose a customer as a result of a missed call or bad customer service ever again. Visualize how much time you will save not having a member of your staff do all of this by him or herself. Visualize how much money you will now make. The heart of our system resides with our cutting edge technology and our state of the art call center.
Staffed by knowledgeable, professional, and courteous customer care representatives, our call center can coordinate incoming calls that would otherwise be routed into your business and help with any technical questions that your callers may have. You and your customers can enjoy top-flight service, instant answers, and fewer mistakes. Hop onboard and see why people all over the continent are calling Answer North America.
